DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of XP12B in women with heavy menstrual bleeding associated with menorrhagia.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of XP12B in Women With Menorrhagia
DOC.criteria: Women with menorrhagia 1849 years of age Regularly occuring menstrual periods History or presence of clinically significant disease or abnormalities that might confound the study History of bilateral oophorectomy or hysterectomy
